segments.text: I see the woman standing in the puddle, and she doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and she’s still drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t turned off the faucet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, taking those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall, and the girl is just waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the whole kitchen is going to be ruined soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so oblivious, it’s almost funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should step in and stop them before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just a mess waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll ever notice what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
